name: seerrbridge
description: SeerrBridge is a companion tool that links Seerr with additional media backends, allowing enhanced cross-service interactions and automation for home media setups.
features: Seerr integration: Connects Seerr with additional media management backends.
Request forwarding: Routes media requests to appropriate download clients automatically.
Multi-backend support: Manages connections to multiple Radarr, Sonarr, or similar instances.
Automation rules: Creates custom workflows for request handling and processing.
Status synchronization: Keeps request status in sync across connected services.
Notification relay: Forwards notifications between Seerr and backend services.
API bridging: Translates API calls between different service versions and formats.
Load balancing: Distributes requests across multiple backend instances for scalability.
Error handling: Retries failed requests and provides detailed error reporting.
Configuration management: Centralized configuration for all connected services.
Health monitoring: Tracks connectivity and health of all integrated backends.
Logging system: Records all bridge operations for troubleshooting and auditing.
